summary: A direct-to-consumer marketplace app (SamriddhiSrot / ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§) for ultra-rare regional Indian products. Design system: Earth Brown #8B4513 (headers/buttons), Sand Gold #DAA520 (accents/badges), Ivory Cream #FFFFF0 (background), Forest Green #228B22 (UPI/success), Kutch Indigo #4B0082 (producer brands); Poppins Bold headers, Roboto body, Playfair Display Italic taglines; 16px grid, 12px border radius, 0 4px 8px shadow. 8 screens: Splash (2s, ivory‚Üígold gradient), Home Dashboard (fixed header, search, featured cards, region chips, bottom nav), Producer Discovery (3x2 grid cards with voice story + badges), Producer Profile (follow button, brand story, voice player, WhatsApp/Live Call actions), Product Detail (full-width image, badges, voice story player, UPI Buy Now + Custom Request WhatsApp), Producer Brand Setup (brand form + 30sec voice recorder), Checkout (Razorpay UPI, 92% direct messaging), My Collection (order cards, re-order, rate, stats). Bottom nav persists across all screens. Razorpay SDK for UPI with WhatsApp order confirmation.
architectural_notes: Marketplace: producers set their own prices; no intermediary involved in transactions
Media-heavy: each product has an associated voice note and optional live video stream
Region-specific product availability tied to producer's location
92% producer profit model: platform takes 8% commission post-sale; first month free
Producer branding layer: each producer has a custom brand (name, logo, tagline, color) shown throughout the app
Rarity gamification: badges and FOMO countdown timers on scarce products to drive urgency

Design tokens: Earth Brown #8B4513, Sand Gold #DAA520, Ivory Cream #FFFFF0, Forest Green #228B22, Kutch Indigo #4B0082; Poppins Bold / Roboto / Playfair Display Italic; 16px grid, 12px radius, shadow 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
Payment: Razorpay SDK integration with PhonePe/GPay/Paytm/Bank UPI options; WhatsApp order confirmation after successful payment
Region filter chips include: Himalayas, Northeast, Rajasthan, Kerala, Tribal (Kerala added alongside existing four)

existing_features.title: Implement a Producer Dashboard page where authenticated producers can register/edit their profile (name, region, bio, photo), create and manage product listings (title, description, price, region, stock, thumbnail), upload or record a voice note per product, and manage their orders.

The product detail page must prominently display producer name, region, product story, price, stock, a playable embedded voice note player for the producer's audio recording, and an 'Add to Cart / Buy Now' button for direct purchase.

Implement a voice note recording and playback feature on the frontend. On the producer side, allow recording directly in the browser (MediaRecorder API) or uploading an audio file per product. Store the audio as a base64-encoded blob in the backend. On the consumer side, render an audio player on the product detail page.

Implement a Live Video section where producers can announce and start a simulated live session (title, description, scheduled time). Display an active 'Live Now' badge on their profile and product pages when a session is marked active. Show a live sessions listing page for consumers to browse ongoing and upcoming streams. Since true WebRTC/streaming is not supported, represent live sessions via status cards with producer details and a story/description field that producers update in real time.

Implement a simple direct purchase flow: consumer selects a product, specifies quantity, confirms purchase, and an order record is created in the backend linking their principal to the product and producer. Show an order confirmation screen and an order history page for consumers.
